Question: The rough edge of this person's singing was unsettling to some early listeners but an attraction to others.
Hints: Between July 1984 and March 1985, this person recorded Empire Burlesque.
This was the first time this person had sanctioned a re-mix of one of his classic recordings.
Pennebaker has said the sequence was this person's idea, and it has been widely imitated in both music videos and advertisements.
